website_summaries.verdict: Rely on Tide in powder form to clean 102 loads of clothes, linens, and other materials, leaving them feeling fresh with this detergent.
pros: Backed by a reputable laundry brand
Keeps whites white and colors stay in their true form, wash after wash. Has the fresh and pleasing scent of Tide
Sensitive enough to use on baby clothing and cloth diapers to get them clean
cons: Some find the smell of this a bit overpowering

customer_reviews.title: Time to return to powder laundry soap!!
customer_reviews.text: I did like the scent, value, and freshness of the Tide. I have been using the liquid soap and having used this powder form, I don't think I will go back liquid. I like that I can use in my HE front load washer...but note that it has to be added inside the washer. My clothes are so so much cleaner even compared to liquid tide!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great! Cleans beautifully! Reminds me of my childhood!
customer_reviews.text: This may be the Mountain Breeze scent, but it reminds me of what the Original Tide powder smelled like when I was a child. It also cleans as well as the powder Tide my mother used when I was a child, possibly even better, and I'm 44 yrs of age now. This almost instantly became my favorite detergent just from the smell, but when I saw how well it cleaned, that clinched it for me. Definitely going to keep buying it, wherever I can find it for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: curlymommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Not So Happy With This One
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I don't know where this stuff is manufactured but there was a fowl order in the detergent! Maybe it's time for someone to actually go and trace where this stuff is being packed! Sorry this isn't another one of my happy purchases -- just think you folks should know. Cleo P.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Cleo P. Capers

customer_reviews.title: I love how little of this I need to do a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how little of this I need to do a load of wash. I use it primarily for my husbands work clothes and for cloth diapers. It makes everything smell so good and removes most stains. We used to get hand me downs from a family friend when we were kids and I loved how they smelled. When I opened this box I was happy to find that was the smell! One thing I don't like is it crusts up on the agitator in my washer if I pour it on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: fake product
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to be a fake Tide detergent or maybe it's made by a third party. Amazon should follow up with P&G about the authenticity of this product. This Tide detergent had strong alkaline odor and high foam, does not have the same scent as the real Tide powder I use to have. It worked OK in terms of cleaning, but it's not Tide powder.
customer_reviews.author: User from PA

customer_reviews.title: FINE TUNE YOUR WASH
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all, I'll use it again but use a little (1/2) cup of amounia,) it whitens,and brightens WITH OUT out bleeding colors, as where clorox, or bleach will bleed colors and cause fading or distroy your colors!! Bleach is for "WHITE" only and should be mixed at 1/2 cup bleach to one full cup of water for a FULL WASH LOAD, & 1/4 cup bleach to 3/4 cup of WATER for small to medium load of whites only.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Of Augusta

customer_reviews.title: You are on the wrong product page
customer_reviews.text: This is 2.3x as expensive as it was the last time I bought it. I don't know whether to blame Amazon or Tide/P&G for this ridiculous pricing, but I know people are still buying this without realizing they are paying 2x. I've bought this 5x in the past between 2017 and 2018; each time I paid $12.96 for 95oz/68 loads. Just a very important FYI. The detergent works as advertised. But you would be out of your mind to buy this specific product. Tide sells the same thing for half the price on other listings on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KodishJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve found this to be the best laundry detergent for my sensitive skin. And it’s a powder you’d have a hard time finding in stores. My washer works best with powder detergent. Best value for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning and fresh clean scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh clean scent plus the way it cleans my whites and removes most stains, too!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cloth Diapers
customer_reviews.text: Our family uses cloth diapers for our daughter and trust me, if you don't use Tide Ultra, you're gonna get stinky diapers in no time. Essential for cloth diaperers!
customer_reviews.author: Carsley

customer_reviews.title: Tide
customer_reviews.text: Has always worked well. I have used Tide products for several years. At 70 years old that makes it several years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as far as washing clothes is concerned. What I dont like is the very strong scent. Gave it a try but I really go for milder scents
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Decent balance between value and scent.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a more noticeable and long lasting fresh laundry smell. Scent is fine, but not very noticeable. Seems to clean things just fine, although I haven’t yet had any big stains to test it on.
customer_reviews.author: KeyExpert

customer_reviews.title: IT STINKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made all of my clothes stink. STAY AWAY FROM THIS HORRIBLE PRODUCT. I was washing my laundry 2 and 3 times to get the stink out. I thought something was wrong with my washing machine because for the life Of me I could not understand why a company would make a laundry detergent that would make your clothes stink.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Clumps in wash-= double wash duty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of these. FOUR! THey are for HE washing machines- yet clump up and leave a grossly stain (removable) on every piece of clothing. I would like to exhange for liquid- but alas- not excepted.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stringer

customer_reviews.title: I much prefer powered detergent to liquid or the gels ...
customer_reviews.text: I much prefer powered detergent to liquid or the gels. I couldn't find it anywhere for quite a white. This new variety washes really well and seems to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: high priced
customer_reviews.text: high priced and didn't work any better then regular tide
customer_reviews.author: W. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Better than the pods for bleaching whites
customer_reviews.text: Use this just for my whites with bleach and it works great
customer_reviews.author: David Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but Tide can clean my husbands greasy clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tide for years and unless they change their formula I will continue
customer_reviews.author: Wildwood Flower

customer_reviews.title: Worst detergent ever
customer_reviews.text: Is this even detergent? My clothes came out smelling like they were not even washed. Never feel this way when I use original liquid tide. This stuff is horrible. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: RebaReed

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Delivered right to my door. Smells fresh. Cons: Kind of pricey for the quantity but for having it delivered I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Gret

customer_reviews.title: Good quality detergent but was expensive!!
customer_reviews.text: Got little box for more than the price of a large box. This was a rip off, but I needed it so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S. White

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully smelling clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value for money! This box arrived promptly and had lasted a long time! My clothes smell wonderful after each wash! I will definitely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: MR ANDREW ROWSON

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention, I saw the price and figured it was the larger size. My local grocer sells this size for less.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Lampert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel like it's doing anything
customer_reviews.text: My mon said this is trash. It doesn't feel like it's doing anything. I went back to the pods now.
customer_reviews.author: sdq

customer_reviews.title: Effective.
customer_reviews.text: This product has removed stains that other detergents left in. It seems to be about the most effective laundry detergent I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Keith Ing

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tide keeps the clothes clean & smelling good. Plus I don't have to use a ton of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: ... version that is only sold at Target works WAY better at getting stains out
customer_reviews.text: This tide is OK- but the liquid version that is only sold at Target works WAY better at getting stains out. Plus, it's less messy and more easily measured.
customer_reviews.author: N. Head

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat Tide
customer_reviews.text: A staple in my house for many years. It's hard to beat Tide for proper cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific way to help my disabled mother, delivery right to her doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but definitely leaves your clothes smelling a bit different than the liquid detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Smelling Classic
customer_reviews.text: The best smell ever! Have loved this scent since it came out. Can’t beat Tide! Great cleaning power!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely. Wish the packaging was better
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely. Wish the packaging was better, maybe with a bag inside, so that the powder is not directly in the cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: No comparison, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.text: I love tide detergent because it's at the top the very top when it comes to getting your laundry clean. No comparison, can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Mitsuko

customer_reviews.title: kjhakherk
customer_reviews.text: carton arrived crushed. Powder was leaking out of the box. Box was too big for the product so it collapsed during shipping. There was no packing material in the box to avoid this. Soap is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Furrer

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent for High Efficiency washers
customer_reviews.text: Great detergent for High Efficiency washers. I tried this instead of the pods to see which is more efficient money wise...
customer_reviews.author: W. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Sent in a BAG, box broke, soap all over
customer_reviews.text: Received a BOX of detergent in an unlined BAG, of course it broke, soap all over, soap is great but gave bad review for very bad packing, can't return.
customer_reviews.author: C. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Tide for you too!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is so nice to be delivered - love not having to lug it home and getting it at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Soda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love the smell. And did a terrific job cleaning my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a competitive price. Works excellent. Will continue to reorder and use this product.
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely don't need as much as they say
customer_reviews.text: I usually use about a quarter of the "small" load recommended amount for a heavy load in my HE washer. Any more than that, especially in a smaller load, and it gets too sudsy.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireElaine

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I was so upset to see the size of the box upon arrival. Way overpriced for the size. I’m so upset I couldn’t return it. Never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jerod palagi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast which was good because I needed to do laundry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Friendly Detergent.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the detergent is very good. Doesn't cause any sort of skin irritation and really gets rid of all sorts of dirt from clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: Great value use for when doing hand wash when unable to get to laundry mat; keeping my detergents in trunk of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Tide's cleaning power is fantastic. Whether your clothes has been dirty for weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Tide's cleaning power is fantastic. Whether your clothes has been dirty for weeks or for just a couple of days, it will remove strong odors and stains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Item
customer_reviews.text: Tide box was opened when I opened the amazon box. Spilling detergent everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My main reason for ordering it was to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for ordering it was to get the Mountain Spring scent. It has a different smell than what I was used to, so I assume the ULTRA feature made the smell different. It's ok but I wouldn't go to the trouble again. However, I am hoping Tide doesn't discontinue powder detergent, since I have seen less and less powder offered in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Carolyn Vahrenhorst

customer_reviews.title: A sure cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: It's Tide . . . not much else to say! I've never used another brand, and I'm on up there in years.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Em

customer_reviews.title: This one stacks up pretty well against the competition and the price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and concentrated. There are some spots that no detergent can handle, no matter what the ads tell you! This one stacks up pretty well against the competition and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Weelosh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the smell at all, caused itching reactions for my husband and son.
customer_reviews.author: HaloM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice price does the trick for he washers this should last a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tide Powder Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I like the way Tide works, shipping is always fast and free (with Prime) The problem I have is mine alone. I have lung disease, and its hard to handle the powder plume. But I love Tide...
customer_reviews.author: V. J. McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I expected for some reason but still worth the price. A little goes a long way and it smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby L

customer_reviews.title: Had to stop using
customer_reviews.text: Smell good but I am not sure why I started to itch after using it.
customer_reviews.author: jamaal white

customer_reviews.title: Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with this long-standing product. It really gets the dirt out!
customer_reviews.author: growup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love my tide. Its the only thing that will bring the dirt out of the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: rosewood

customer_reviews.title: Tide is a great brand. It get our clothes clean
customer_reviews.text: Tide is a great brand. It get our clothes clean. Not a fan of the mountain spring scent, the original one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Nyaht

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$
customer_reviews.text: Says it's for he washers. Doesn't even dissolve. Waste of $$ stick to liquid
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Buy from store
customer_reviews.text: Complete rip off, not worth the money. Can’t rerurn product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Scoop size is too large-- use 1/4 for smaller loads, good foam, cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: TheModernSkeptic

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY ONE
customer_reviews.text: The only detergent my cleaning lady allows me to buy.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LIKED THE PIONEER DOUBLE DIN THE MOST IT FITS PERFECT IN MY SATURN. I LOVE IT ALOT.
customer_reviews.author: URSULA ALFRED

customer_reviews.title: Tide = clean laundry
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - Tide is my preferred brand and this box met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: because i'm handicapped and have a difficult time carrying this, purchasing it is better
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wins every time!
customer_reviews.text: Tried lots of other detergents. Tide is the best.......by far. I have dogs and muddy footprints abound. Cleans even my white slipcovers!
customer_reviews.author: GrannyBarb

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well and Smells Good Too!
customer_reviews.text: Tide has always gotten the highest ratings from Consumer magazines and even though there are other good products, I prefer Tide, especially if you can buy it at good prices in bulk. This variation(Mountain Spring) also smells good. Bottom line is if you want your clothes clean and fresh smelling, this is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: tennis teacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large box, concentrated so it lasts a long time. Smells goooood.
customer_reviews.author: *Rock Star*Top Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tide itself was good. Price was right. However the box was damaged causing a spill.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaning Product for Clothes
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Vendben

customer_reviews.title: hate the way the box opens
customer_reviews.text: 8 words: works wonders, hate the way the box opens.
customer_reviews.author: Borz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Box to small for the price, will not get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent
customer_reviews.text: My favorite detergent! Laundry always comes out clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: addicted2shop

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Well's it powdered laundry detergent, not much to go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: CA472

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I was bummed that Amazon Dash didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I was bummed that Amazon Dash didn't have a liquid detergent option, but this works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and money wasted
customer_reviews.text: Very very upsetting. Half the box emptied out inside the package box from a huge hole from the formula container that was packaged with this. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Brittney N Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just great..
customer_reviews.text: The box came in damaged, half the soap was gone. Just great..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a tad over a TBLS in my cloth diaper laundry for over a year now with amazing results! As for our regular laundry, the whites used to always turn a dingy grey but when washed in tide they are whitened nicely! Love my tide!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: REFORMULATED, not made specifically for HE
customer_reviews.text: REFORMULATED, not made specifically for HE. If you have soft water, this detergent will flood your HE front loader with suds. Even line 1 in my washer very soft water creates excessive suds that require multiple rinses--think 5 rinses, not 1 or even 2--to clean out. Tide is excellent at cleaning, but whatever this "compatible with standard and HE" crap is, it's not good for HE unless you have hard water.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Strange smell
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy this again. Strange smell after washing. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mariia L.

customer_reviews.title: When I revieved the package, the Powder was spilt ...
customer_reviews.text: When I revieved the package, the Powder was spilt in the box and it was all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Smith

customer_reviews.title: My Go-to Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years (and by "for years" I mean somewhere around 20 years) and it's never let me down. It smells great and does it's job. Super glad I've found it on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: ... get at Sams club so I was a bit disappointed with the size but love the product and that ...
customer_reviews.text: not as big as the box I can get at Sams club so I was a bit disappointed with the size but love the product and that it gets delivered right to my door!
customer_reviews.author: Fran Harris

customer_reviews.title: this product caused blood blisters to form on my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: this product caused blood blisters to form on my skin when i had direct contact by using the scoop in the box. indirect contact resulted in a severe rash covering about a third of my skin. Tide is aware, however disappointing their response is. do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Found it much cheaper on other sites. ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. Found it much cheaper on other sites. Don't be fooled, the size is much smaller in real life than in the picture. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I do not like porq ne ribaron money and did not bring me anything
customer_reviews.author: Paola Rivas

customer_reviews.title: super clean in hard water
customer_reviews.text: I've cloth diapered 3 babies over a total of 10 years and is the only detergent that gets my cloth diapers, and other clothing of course, super clean in hard water. I prefer and tried all the natural stuff but in the end this is the miracle worker. If you cloth diaper, and wash in hard water specifically, I highly suggest putting a regular amount of detergent on a lower water lever. I know it sounds like cloth diaper blasphemy but it works, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Okcoolpanda

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent! Much better than liquid!
customer_reviews.text: I have used liquid detergent all my life and recently switched to this brand. This lasts so much longer than a bottle of liquid which saves a ton of $$ For those worried about it clumping, I live in the Northeast US and only use tap cold water in my washing machine. I have never had any residue or clumping in the 100s of loads of laundry I have done. Everything comes out perfect and smelling great, and the powder dissolves even in cold water. I take care of a sick relative and even heavily soiled clothing comes out fresh. 5 Stars you cannot go wrong with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Titan

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not rating the product, I use Tide all the time and it's great. I'm rating the value of this product - I don't know how you can charge $25 for 95 ounces. You can find this less expensive in every grocery store and online. Costco sells 254 ounces for $32.99 - 1 1/2 times the product for only $7 more. This subscribe and save item is ridiculous. I'm disappointed in myself for not checking the ounces before I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Classic clean scent!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have been able to switch to natural products in many areas, I have not been able to give up my TIDE. This classic formula has that fresh smell that I associate with clean that I cannot seem to replicate by using any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t by laundry soap on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy laundry soap on amazon, way too expensive and the container is extremely small. Don’t be lazy, just go to the store or ask someone to go to the store for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the size before buying
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve checked the size before buying it. It’s good just that my mom has a laundromat and I asked her how much she got it for and she told me a little pricier than this price but she told me it’s huge size. So I went cheap and bought this one seeing it’s cheaper. When I got it, it was very small.... should’ve went with my mom’s offer
customer_reviews.author: Haixin Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I was told tide powder has an ingredient that can kill fungus, etc from jock itch, athlete's foot etc. It seems to be working alright... I have an empty bottle of liquid detergent, I put one large scoop of this in it and fill it with hot water and shake to dissolve. Then I pour it in my laundry machine which only uses cold water. Seems to work, but has a weird smell sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Hi, I'm Karl

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the fragrance of this version of Tide and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the fragrance of this version of Tide and the powder all dissolves in cold water which is important especially in the winter when the water is really cold. This is a good value for the money and the great cleaning power can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm just a little old fashioned because I still use the Tide powder and Mountain Spring at that. I can't remember not using Mountain Spring but lately, much to my chagrin, it has been very hard to find. I was thrilled when I found it on Amazon and I hope they continue to sell it for a many years to come. Quite a few people over the years, have commented on how lovely our clothes smell and ask what kind of detergent I use. I direct them to Tide Mountain Spring. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Daylily

customer_reviews.title: Tough on grease and stains
customer_reviews.text: With 2 boys in sports and a husband who runs restaurants, I need a detergent that is tough on grease and stains. Tide has been my go to for years, but the liquid can leave residue unlike the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Get your Tide in!
customer_reviews.text: My mom swears by Tide. She prefers the powder as she has been having residue left by the Pods. She really likes the cleaning ability and wonderful scents of Tide. The price is very reasonable too!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kobayashi

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE WRAP IN PLASTIC FOR SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but, the entire box smells like tide. I have plasticcutlery and food packed in the same box. Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: bhg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I swear this works waaaaaay better than the Pods I was using...fresh, clean clothes for cheap! The family HAS noticed a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Oceananic

customer_reviews.title: best on the market, free shipping with Prime
customer_reviews.text: a long-time household product that lives up to its name
customer_reviews.author: Doris

product_meta.title: Tide Mountain Spring He Turbo Powder Laundry Detergent 68 Loads, Ultra Mountain Powder, 95 Ounce
product_meta.description: Tide Mountain Spring HE Turbo Powder Laundry Detergent, 68 Loads 95 Ounce
feature_bullets: 6x the cleaning power in half the time (1 dose of Tide HE Turbo Clean in quick cycle vs. 6 doses of the next leading liquid HE compatible detergent in normal cycle)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
